channel.title: reflection
channel.description: Eric Dobbs' reflections on technology, ecology, humanity, spirituality, and mind.

item.title: Dream Encyclopedia
item.description: In the late nineteen eighties, I day-dreamed a very cool animated encyclopedia. I'm looking at a photo-realistic animation of a falcon in flight. I'm able to adjust the camera position to observe the falcon's movement from various angles and to zoom in on details like the tail feathers, or wing tips. In an adjacent window pane I can see a larger view of the falcon in the context of its flight. The window panes are synchronized so that I can see how the adjustments in the tail feathers effect the flight path in the more distant view.

item.title: Zork Threads
item.description: The first time I played with a computer, I played Adventure on the mainframe at Dad's work with my brother, Greg. Zork has appeared repeatedly in my life since then.

item.title: When I grow up...
item.description: I've got very ambitious goals for my life's work. I want to change the world.
